Title: The Host
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Rachel Roberts, Shyaam Karra, Brent Wendell Williams, Jhil McEntyre
Plot: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.
Production: Nick Wechsler, Fickle Fish, Chockstone Pictures
